name: Growve
description:
This is my first Jam game, made for the Firith Studio's Great Spring Jam! It was tough to make a game with a deadline, but I barely managed it. At the moment, there's only one dungeon (time constraints) but I will eventually update it with three more.

Growve saves your progress after each death, and when completing a dungeon.  Progress is automatically loaded when opening the game.
To start a new playthrough, select "Start Over" on the title screen (also cleans your game data).

CONTROLS:
Title: Arrow keys to move and Z to select.
Game: Arrow keys to move and Z to attack.
